name: Drawings are marked for construction, are the latest revision and are entered on drawing register
Available space has been checked and proposed distribution boards will fit

Shop drawings have been submitted and approved
Available space has been re-checked and boards will fit
Switchboard has been manufactured, factory inspection tests have been completed and switchboard is approved for delivery to site

Switchboard has been installed
All connections have been checked, all penetrations have been sealed, all outgoing circuits are safe for energizing

Distribution board and outgoing circuits have been tested
Testing records have been completed
Certificate of electrical safety has been submitted
Distribution Board and final sub-circuits have been energised
Final as Installed drawings have been drafted and submitted for approval
